text: In azoʙ az on saʙaʙ ʙud, ki pajomʙaronaşon ʙo dalelhoi ravşan nazdaşon omadand, vale pajomʙaronaşro inkor kardand va Alloh ham ononro ʙa azoʙaş furū girift. Va haroina, Alloh nerūmand ast, kase Ūro maƣluʙ natavonad kard va saxtuquʙat ast ʙa kasone, ki ʙa Ū imon naovardand va nofarmonʙardorī kardaand
